page.title: 12A Day In Shanes life.
page.content: I get up in the morning at 7.45 a.m., get dressed and washed then I go down stairs .My mum gets my breakfast ready. I have rice crackles.Then my mum makes my lunch for school. I brush my hair and put my shoes on. My mum puts my lunch in my bag. I kiss her and set off for school at 8.30. My school is Ripon Cathedral C.E. Primary School. I get to school at 8.45a.m. I play for a while in the playground. At 9.00a.m., we line up as the bell goes. We go in for lessons. At 9.10a.m, we go for assembly.In the afternoon, I like art and craft.When we go home at 4.45p.m., I get some different clothes on. I have my tea and wash up. After my tea, I play football. I like being in goal. At 7.00p.m., I go home, put my pyjamas on and get washed. Later, I go to bed. I sleep like a log.
